KSLU_RSLT_USG_TYPE.NAME: Final Grade
KSLU_RSLT_USG_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Final learning result for an LU. A stereotypical usage is the final grade in a course.

KSLU_RSLT_USG_TYPE.NAME: Midterm Grade
KSLU_RSLT_USG_TYPE.TYPE_DESC: Midterm learning result for an LU. A stereotypical usage is the midterm grade in a course.
